channel.title: Interstate Travel Weather Page
channel.description: Audio weather forecasts for major US Interstates. An Interactive US map to click on.

item.title: Interstate 95 Weather
item.description: Get daily weather forecasts for the entire length of I-95. Temperature forecasts, radars, and and Audio weather cast starts automatically playing. Updated daily or every other day if the forecast is on!

item.title: Interstate 90 Weather
item.description: Get daily weather forecasts for the entire length of I-90. Temperature forecasts, radars, and and Audio weather cast starts automatically playing. Updated daily or every other day if the forecast is on!

item.title: Interstate 85 Weather
item.description: Get daily weather forecasts for the entire length of I-85. The Audio weather cast starts automatically playing. Typically no longer than a minute and a half. Longer in serious weather. Updated daily or every other day if the forecast is on!
